trans-unit.source: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 HTTP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

trans-unit.source: Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains).
trans-unit.target: 通道會傳輸訊息跨越遠端界限 （例如，之間電腦或應用程式定義域）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> class transports messages using the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>類別傳輸使用 HTTP 通訊協定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls.
trans-unit.target: 通道會使用.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端的遠端物件的呼叫時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。

trans-unit.source: It is then deserialized and processed.
trans-unit.target: 然後還原序列化，並處理。

trans-unit.source: Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel.
trans-unit.target: 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。

trans-unit.source: To perform additional processing of messages on the client-side, you can specify an implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider> through which all messages processed by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> are passed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行額外處理的訊息用戶端中，您可以指定的實作<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider>透過所處理的所有訊息<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>傳遞。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel> uses a SOAP formatter to serialize all messages.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel>用來序列化所有的訊息的 SOAP 格式器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method) or programmatically (by passing a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>集合<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A>建構函式）。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> to set up a remoting server and its client.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>設定遠端處理伺服器與用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The example contains three parts:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含三個部分：

trans-unit.source: A server
trans-unit.target: 伺服器

trans-unit.source: A client
trans-unit.target: 用戶端

trans-unit.source: A remote object used by the server and the client
trans-unit.target: 伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a client for this server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範此伺服器的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範在伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The configuration properties of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> instance returned by this constructor are all set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>這個建構函式所傳回的執行個體設定為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 集合，指定通道要使用的組態屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider" /> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> class with the specified configuration properties and sink.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組態屬性和接收，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性的格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> 之新執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider" /> to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> class with the specified name and sink.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和接收，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A> property using the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel.ChannelName%2A>屬性使用`name`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Every registered channel has a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定頻道<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels.
trans-unit.target: 優先順序控制的順序中的競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點。較高的優先順序通道連線之前較低優先順序通道。

trans-unit.source: The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The URL to which the new sink will deliver messages.
trans-unit.target: 新接收應該將訊息傳遞至的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收應該將訊息傳遞至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

trans-unit.source: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.CreateMessageSink%2A> method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.CreateMessageSink%2A>方法會傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。

trans-unit.source: If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink.
trans-unit.target: 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收做為目標。

trans-unit.source: Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`url`或`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.CreateMessageSink%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.CreateMessageSink%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the client channel is secured.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用戶端通道是否受到保護。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> is the client channel is secured otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端通道受到保護則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The key of the channel property to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的通道屬性索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified channel property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的通道屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the channel property specified by <paramref name="key" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示由 <paramref name="key" /> 指定的通道屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Item%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of keys that the channel properties are associated with.
trans-unit.target: 取得與通道屬性相關聯之索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of keys that the channel properties are associated with.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，其與通道屬性相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Channel properties are used to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通道屬性可用來設定通道在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible channel properties and an example, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的頻道內容與範例的清單，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Keys%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>類別。

trans-unit.source: The URL from which to extract the URI of the remote well-known object.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取遠端已知物件 URI 的來源 URL。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the URI of the remote well-known object.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含存有遠端已知物件 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the channel URI and the remote well-known object URI from the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 URL 擷取通道 URI 和遠端已知物件 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the current channel, or <see langword="null" /> if the specified URL is not an HTTP URL.
trans-unit.target: 目前通道的 URI，如果指定的 URL 不是 HTTP URL 則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Parse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel.Parse%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel>類別。
